# Kelvin Edimeh - Product Designer Portfolio

## About
Kelvin Edimeh is a Product Designer based in Lagos, Nigeria, specializing in UI/UX, product strategy, and bold digital experiences.

## Projects
- DERU: Alpine Gorpcore E-commerce
- ARC: Fintech App Design
- Joulene: Battery Tech Website
- RentBoss: Real Estate Rental App
- LumenOne: AI-Powered Learning Platform
- SwitTea: Beverage Brand Platform
- KML: Creative Agency Site
